# anchors

**Instance Property**

The collection of anchors contained in the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var anchors: Scene.AnchorCollection { get set }
```

## Adding and removing anchors

- **addAnchor(_:)**: Adds an anchor to the scene’s list of anchors.
- **removeAnchor(_:)**: Removes the specified anchor from the scene.
